# Changelog

## 17.0.0 - 2025-09-28

- Upgrade to Unicode 17.0.0.
- Drop support for Python versions earlier than 3.8.

- Upgrade to Unicode 16.0.0.

## 15.1.0 - 2023-11-11

- Upgrade to Unicode 15.1.0.

## 15.0.0 - 2022-10-01

- Upgrade to Unicode 15.0.0.

- Upgrade to Unicode 14.0.0.
